text:
Good news. But voters need to close out the #CARecall as if polls are showing @GavinNewsom 20 points in the hole to lose. 

It's Gattaca time: Leave nothing in the tank for the swim back.

No downside to blowing past 50% for NO. Life or death for falling short. #VoteNoOnTheRecall https://t.co/72on3pE5WI
